title: "The finer touch: when ‘artificial skin’ is more sensitive than the original"
excerpt: "Researchers at TU Graz have developed a \"smart skin\" material that is more sensitive than human skin, capable of sensing pressure, moisture, and temperature. The material has potential applications in prosthetics and healthcare."
